page.title: 05SOUTH LINCOLN
page.content: {HYKEHAM} Hykeham is only 2 miles from the beautiful cathedral city of Lincoln. But you don't need to go to the town centre to shop,in this area you can go to a super store,shopping precinct within 1 mile.Where ever you are you are not far from a very nice shop or playing area,there are no factories in this area until you have driven a good few miles.For aeroplane buffs only 10 min drive away are R.A.F Swinderby,or R.A.F Waddington.20 minutes away is R.A.F.Scampton, base of the{RED {ARROWS}display team,and 25 minutes drive away is R.A.F.Cranwell.This area is residential with 2 or 3 hotels on the A46.You've probably heard about sunsets in Japan and Cape Sunion in Greece,but I would suggest you think of this area as one of their rivals!
